author: Unreal Engine
description:
Join this session to find out about MetaHuman for Maya, the brand new Autodesk Maya plugin developed by Epic Games.

The session focuses on a specific feature, the MetaHuman Expression Editor, to edit facial expressions. Learn how to install the plugin, and get started in editing MetaHumans in the ways not possible until now. The session also covers how to assemble a rig and load an animation, and easily edit expressions.

The presentation showcases a workflow of expression editing as well as some of the latest technologies used by 3Lateral to create MetaHumans. The session concludes with a demonstration of the workflow for exporting the updated MetaHuman and highlights these updates in Unreal Engine.

#MetaHumanForMaya, #MetaHumanExpressionEditor, #MetaHuman, #DigitalHumans, #3Lateral, #Autodesk, #UnrealEngine, #UnrealFestOrlando2025
title: MetaHuman: Facial Expression Editing | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Read the rules & register here: https://itch.io/jam/mega-stack-o-jam

We’re excited to announce that registration is now open for the Mega Stack ‘O’ Jam! This seven-day game jam is your chance to join fellow developers in a fantastic event centered around level design using the new and improved Stack-o-Bot 2.0 Sample project.
Work independently to showcase your skills in an environment that fosters fun and creativity. While there are judging criteria that cover gameplay, audio, and fun factor, the spotlight will be on level design, which carries a higher point potential of 10!
Don’t miss this chance to hone your skills and unleash your creativity. We can’t wait to see what you come up with!

Stack 'O' Bot Sample Project: https://www.fab.com/listings/b4dfff49-0e7d-4c4b-a6c5-8a0315831c9c
Stack 'O' Bot Documentation: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/unreal-engine/stackobot-sample-game-in-unreal-engine
title: Mega Stack 'O' Jam, Game Jam Kickoff | Inside Unreal
